    • setOptimalWeights

    • optimize

      default void optimize(LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> estimationFunction, DataSet<N> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction<N> objective, int step)
      Description copied from interface: Optimizer
      Optimizes the given estimation function based on the entire training set and the specified objective function.

      Typical implementations evaluate the ObjectiveFunction across the training set, compute parameterGradients, and update the parameters of the estimation function accordingly.

      Specified by:
      optimize in interface Optimizer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N extends Number>, N extends Number>
      Parameters:
      estimationFunction - the estimation function (model) to optimize
      trainingSet - the dataset used for optimization
      objective - the objective function that defines the loss and parameterGradients
